adverts.name: adverts
adverts.message: For non-LIVE (INT, TEST, STAGE), do not change this flagpole without speaking to GNL/bbc.com (WWGNDevelopmentTeam@bbc.com) first.

ccprivate.name: ccprivate
ccprivate.trueDesc: The Barlesque BBCDOTCOM module sets the cache-control header to private
ccprivate.falseDesc: The cache-control header is NOT set by the Barlesque BBCDOTCOM module
